content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my Munich apartment, let me begin with a slightly higher proposal than what you might expect, aiming to maximize my earnings. However, please remember our negotiation is solely focused on this aspect and doesn't include lease terms or utility costs. Now, I suggest a monthly rent of 1200 Euros. If you find this satisfactory, I'd say 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' but if not, feel free to counter with your preferred amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price seems significantly higher than what I expect for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe more reasonable rents can be found in this market.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Max Müller. However, my priority is to obtain the highest possible rental income for my property. If we cannot find common ground here, I'll have to decline further negotiations in this instance. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
